name: @cwd/pocketbase
description: Unofficial PocketBase SaaS backend prepared for secure kubernetes deployment
author: Ádám Liszkai <pocketbase@adaliszk.io>

scripts.build: opsx docker buildx build --platform linux/arm/v7,linux/arm64,linux/amd64 --tag adaliszk/pocketbase:^PKG_VERSION^ --tag adaliszk/pocketbase:latest  .
scripts.test: opsx docker build --tag adaliszk/pocketbase:develop . && opsx docker run -p 8080:8080 adaliszk/pocketbase:develop
